__e: Because it's wrong! And I may have wandered pretty far from the church, but I do still believe there are some things that only God should do!
He said that, but then nothing could be further from the truth.
I'm sorry for that, because nothing could be further from the truth.
Then I wandered from him. And when I tried to find him again I had lost him.
If I did step back from him, it was because of you.
Just look into my eyes and say that... you don't feel the pain of parting with him.
"It's been very hard being far from my family, who I love more than anything in the world."
From the beginning, my goal with this book was to tell the truth, and I haven't strayed from that.
I've been away from this stuff, and I don't know if I'm good anymore. And besides, I've told ya... or maybe I didn't tell you... I lost a lot of my cases.
Listen, I was dragged off the bus before I got to tell you this, but I'm sorry.
The last time I saw you wearing it was the night I was sent away from the palace the night father died.
I never left your father's path or your path in my entire life.
Grandma, you gave me everything... you made me stay in school, you kept me out of trouble.
I usually try to stay away from female drama, but one time after school I saw something kind of weird.
Now that you've taken care of one son, investigating a death he shouldn't be, do you want to talk about how we're going to keep Jamie out of the paper?
